Keywords: Armor , Robot , S.T.A.R. Labs
Real Name: Vanessa Kapatelis
Special Powers
EXPERIMENTAL NANITES: When Silver Swan is targeted by Outwit, until its duration expires, she can't use any of her powers and can't make range attacks.
RAZOR WINGS AND CLAWS: Giant Reach: 2, Blades/Claws/Fangs. // FREE: If Silver Swan has not attacked, or has not been placed, this turn, make a close attack using Blades/Claws/Fangs.
